author: sebor
msg: * 25.generate.cpp: Eliminated the checking of the value of the numeric
argument, N, passed to the --nloops=N command line option, obviated by
the implementation of restricted numeric arguments in the test driver

author: sebor
msg: * cmdopt.cpp (cmdopts_t): Added minval_ and maxval_ for the lower
and upper bound, respectively, of restricted numeric arguments.
(rw_vsetopts): Enhanced to allow restricted numeric arguments

author: bandaram
msg: DERBY-772: Improve fix for bug derby-649 to allow IN list optimization.
Now IN lists of the form REF IN <constantList> can be pushed from Unions into underlying select statements.
